item.title: Trump 2nd term live updates: US, Ukraine could agree to mineral deal soon
item.description: The United States and Ukraine could sign the minerals deal as soon as Tuesday, according to two sources briefed on the discussions.

item.title: WATCH: Watch incredible moon landing captured in stunning video
item.description: Texas startup Firefly Aerospace made history Sunday when it landed its spacecraft, Blue Ghost, on the lunar surface with a flawless touchdown.

item.title: Pope Francis remains stable and prognosis reserved, Vatican says
item.description: The pope, 88, suffered two episodes of "acute respiratory failure" on Monday.
